pod_interior.description: You are inside a cramped, metallic pod. Wires hang loosely from the ceiling, and various dormant screens line the walls. The main hatch is to the east.

pod_exterior.description: You stand on dusty, reddish ground just outside the crashed pod. The sky is a hazy orange. Paths seem to lead north, south, east, and west into the surrounding barren landscape.

north_terrain.description: Rocky cliffs rise to the north. The ground here is uneven and difficult to traverse. The only clear path is back south.

south_terrain.description: A vast expanse of shifting red sand stretches southwards. It looks treacherous. The way back north seems safer.

east_terrain.description: Strange, crystalline flora sprouts from the ground to the east. They hum faintly. A path leads back west.
